alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Lower Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:35PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Brewster County through 715 PM CDT... At 635 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Persimmon Gap, or 31 miles northeast of Panther Junction, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Brewster County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Lower Brewster County
